content.question: A triangle has base <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></math> centimeters and height <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> centimeters, where the height is three times the base. Both <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></math> and <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are functions of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, measured in seconds. If <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> represents the area of the triangle, which of the following gives the rate of change of <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with respect to <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to t, equals, 3 b, centimeters per seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>b</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mo>⁢</mo><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>cm/sec</mtext><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to t, equals, 2 b times the derivative of b, with respect to t, centimeters squared per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup><mtext>/sec</mtext><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to t, equals, 3 b times the derivative of b, with respect to t, centimeters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>b</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>cm/sec</mtext><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to t, equals, 3 b times the derivative of b, with respect to t, centimeters squared per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>b</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup><mtext>/sec</mtext><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to t, equals, 3 b times the derivative of b, with respect to t, centimeters squared per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>b</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msup><mtext>/sec</mtext><mo>⁡</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
